uk.co.strangeskies.text.properties

Class StaticPropertyAccessor<S extends Properties<S>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.co.strangeskies.text.properties.StaticPropertyAccessor<S>
  • Type Parameters:
    S - self bound type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Properties<S>, Copyable<S>, Observable<S>, Self<S>

    public abstract class StaticPropertyAccessor<S extends Properties<S>>
extends Object
implements Properties<S>
    A partial implementation for Properties manually implemented types with static locale.

    Implementations can use the localize(String, Object[]) helper method to provide static Localized instances of the correct locale.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface uk.co.strangeskies.utilities.Observable
